input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Unlit Dunhill Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
The Dunhill Fir is a full body tree featuring a generous number of branch tips for holding holiday trimmings. It is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy folding metal tree stand is included.

This Dunhill Fir Full Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6 feet tall with a 46 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and feel lifelike.
Designed to look and feel lifelike, this tree is defined by its close attention to detail, featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips that make up the wide, full-bodied branches that create space for your lights and ornaments.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='Vickerman Westbrook Pine Half Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company First Traditions Perry Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Homcom 6' Tall Unlit Pencil Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight Buffalo Fir 5' Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm Downswept Farmhouse Fir Christmas Tree with Burlap Bag'
  - Name='Alpine Corporation 4' Pre-Lit Artificial Wire Christmas Tree with Star'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Narrow Flip Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Woodland Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill European Silver Fir Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Balsam Fir Narrow Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill 15" Brown Wooden Crate Tree Collar'
  - Name='National Tree Company Canadian Grande Fir Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 7.5ft Tall Unlit Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Ebern Designs 7' Tall Unlit Slim Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='DOMETOUR Artificial Christmas Tree PVC Spruce Fir Tree Foldable Metal Stand Unlit Green Xmas Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 8ft. North Carolina Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Tall Unlit Pencil Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Haute Decor 6.5 Foot Pencil Dumont Fir Unlit Tree'
  - Name='7Ft Pencil Christmas Tree Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree Slim Douglas Fir Xmas Tree With Realistic Branches'
  - Name='Vickerman 30" Unlit Anoka Pine Artificial Christmas Tree with Burlap Base'
  - Name='Vickerman 6.5' Mixed Country Pine Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman Westbrook Pine Half Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: It is an artificial Christmas tree like the reference but is a pine and a half tree (less full and flat-backed), differing in silhouette and fullness.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company First Traditions Perry Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand artificial Christmas tree, likely similar use, but different model and possibly different fullness and branch style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Homcom 6' Tall Unlit Pencil Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar height and fir type but pencil (slim) shape and unlit, differing in fullness, lighting, and possibly construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Buffalo Fir 5' Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also an unlit fir tree, similar product type, but smaller height and no integrated lighting, with likely different branch fullness.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm Downswept Farmhouse Fir Christmas Tree with Burlap Bag
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial fir Christmas tree like reference with rustic style and included burlap bag, similar core function though style details differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Alpine Corporation 4' Pre-Lit Artificial Wire Christmas Tree with Star
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial Christmas tree but much smaller in size, made with wire (less realistic materials), and includes star - different construction and scale.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Narrow Flip Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High quality fir tree like reference, narrow shape with flip branches, pre-lit, similar lifelike construction and features but narrower silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Woodland Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial spruce tree (different species), likely pre-lit and high quality, serving similar purpose but with less similar species and possible shape.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill European Silver Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial silver fir, similar realistic design, pre-lit, comparable to Dunhill Fir in species and construction with slight variation in species.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Balsam Fir Narrow Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar artificial fir tree, narrow profile with high quality lifelike construction, pre-lit variants exist, close in features but slimmer shape.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill 15" Brown Wooden Crate Tree Collar
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This product is an accessory (tree collar), not a tree, so it is not relevant as a competitor product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Canadian Grande Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, very similar full artificial fir tree likely with pre-lit options and similar construction, close competitor to Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 7.5ft Tall Unlit Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Unlit slim Douglas fir tree, taller but slimmer shape, similar product type but less full and no lighting included.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ebern Designs 7' Tall Unlit Slim Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Unlit slim artificial fir, similar species and purpose but differs in height, lighting, and slim shape.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: DOMETOUR Artificial Christmas Tree PVC Spruce Fir Tree Foldable Metal Stand Unlit Green Xmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial spruce/fir mix with foldable metal stand, unlit and likely less full; similar purpose but lower feature match.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 8ft. North Carolina Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Larger artificial spruce tree, likely full body and realistic detail, unlit status unclear, close but differs in species and possibly lighting.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Tall Unlit Pencil Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Tall, unlit, pencil fir tree similar in species but slim shape and no integrated lighting differ from reference full pre-lit tree.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Haute Decor 6.5 Foot Pencil Dumont Fir Unlit Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar height and fir type but pencil (slim) shape and unlit; different fullness and lighting compared to Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 7Ft Pencil Christmas Tree Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree Slim Douglas Fir Xmas Tree With Realistic Branches
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Unlit, slim pencil-shaped artificial Douglas fir with realistic branches; same category but less full and unlit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 30" Unlit Anoka Pine Artificial Christmas Tree with Burlap Base
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Much smaller size (30"), unlit pine tree with burlap base; significant differences in size, fullness, and lighting.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 6.5' Mixed Country Pine Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar height unlit artificial pine tree, likely less full and no lighting, different species but similar purpose.
